executiveSummary: Tyler and Jenny, founders of Bucket Golf, pitched their backyard golf game seeking $1 million for 10% equity. After strong sales growth and product demonstrations, multiple Sharks made offers, with Mark Cuban ultimately securing a deal for $1 million in exchange for 12.5% equity.
keyDecisions: Mark Cuban invested $1 million for 12.5% equity in Bucket Golf.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement with Mark Cuban
Use funds to bolster inventory and strengthen operational logistics

nextSteps: Bucket Golf will collaborate with Mark Cuban to scale operations, improve logistics, and prepare for continued sales growth and potential retail expansion.
